title: IT Support Engineer
responsibilities: Responsible for managing and maintaining the IT infrastructure of the company.
Led three projects at national and international levels.
Managed Active Directory, Group Policy, user accounts, and Linux systems administration.
Managed IT infrastructure including networking, telephony systems (PABX), and router setup.
Oversaw industrial infrastructure such as digital scales, cutting machines, and barcode scanners.
Repaired hardware, set up PCs, and resolved technical issues.
Managed the IT ticketing system to ensure prompt issue resolution.
Reduced department costs by selecting more efficient software solutions.
Maintained printers (Ricoh, Zebra, HP) and related peripherals.
Provided on-site and remote support for IT infrastructure.

title: Software Trainee
responsibilities: Supported research, software development, and project design.
Provided customer support, addressing multiple inquiries daily.
SQL scripting for data querying and analysis.
Performed software testing and documented reports.
Contributed to software development and automation efforts.
